snippet: The refinery near Philadelphia, being acquired from ConocoPhillips for $150 million, is meant to offset the risk of higher jet fuel prices.
abstract: Delta Air Lines will buy the Trainer refinery near Philadelphia from ConocoPhillips for $150 million to offset the risk of higher jet fuel prices.
lead_paragraph: The refinery near Philadelphia, being acquired from ConocoPhillips for $150 million, is meant to offset the risk of higher jet fuel prices.

headline.seo: Delta Air Lines Buys an Oil Refinery
headline.main: Delta Buys Refinery to Get Control of Fuel Costs
headline.print_headline: Delta Buys Refinery to Get Control of Fuel Costs
